name: Ensure to not use default stream(System.Err) for printStackTrace to print throwable and its stack trace in order to protect sensitive information.
Ensure you do file path manipulation without including untrusted data
Ensure not using expired or released resource to prevent access to sensitive data that is associated with a different user or entity.
Ensure you remove console.log() in your production code
Always enable HttpOnly option when creating cookies so that sensitive information is not exposed to unsecured applications and domains
Always enable HttpOnly when creating cookies to avoid Cross-site scripting attacks
Always enable HttpOnly option when creating cookies so that sensitive information is not exposed to unsecured applications and domains
Ensure not relying on the session ID provided by "request.getRequestedSessionId()"
Always enable HttpOnly when creating cookies to avoid Cross-site scripting attacks
Ensure declaring formLogin after requesting authorization and authentication
Ensure cleaning the cookies during the logout to avoid them to be used by another web application
Ensure securing Shutdown Actuator Endpoint from unauthenticated access.
Ensure excluding class parameter for ParametersInterceptor when using Struts 2.3.16 (and older)
Ensure not using wildcard for cookiesName param configuration in CookieInterceptor with Struts 2.3.16 (and Older). This allow preventing Injection attack.
Ensure note using wildcards for action mapping name to avoid executing arbitrary Java code on server side
Always enable HttpOnly when creating cookies to avoid Cross-site scripting attacks
Always enable HttpOnly for cookies in Config file (ASP.NET)
Ensure you have reviewed the web config file and update the value of debug property to false
Ensure you did not keep the tracing activated in your ASPX file to not expose sensitive information for the hackers
Ensure you did not keep the tracing activated in your web config file to not expose sensitive information for the hackers
Ensure the impersonation flag remains set to false (ASP.NET)
Ensure retaining the settings of aspnet:UseLegacyFormsAuthenticationTicketCompatibility to True.
